title: Lights by Night Santa Claus Clip Light, Christmas Lights, Christmas Ornaments, Carabiner Clip, Night Light, Backpack Accessories, Battery Operated Lights, Portable Light, Christmas Décor, 57322
features: Santa Claus Clip Light – No matter the time of year, bring jolly St. Nick himself with you wherever you go — use it as a light or even hang it on your Christmas tree as an illuminating ornament
Carabiner Clip – Easily hook this lightweight Santa onto backpacks, belt loops, keychains and more
Lights Up – Press the ON/OFF button to cause the figure to glow — perfect for use as a night light or guide light
Batteries Powered – Includes two CR2032 batteries to ensure many hours of operation
Created to Last – This high-quality product is created to last, energy efficient and tested for safety
description: For anyone who loves the winter season, there are few things more beloved than the image of Santa Claus himself. Now you can bring along the jolly gift giver wherever you go, year-round, no matter the season! This transportable light features the instantly recognizable likeness of Santa Claus. Emitting a soft white glow, this clip-on light can guide your way in the dark. It’s also perfect as a wonderfully charming holiday decoration and can hang on your Christmas tree as an illuminating ornament! Featuring a clip-on carabiner and lightweight build, you can easily hook the light onto backpacks, beltloops, keychains and much more. Because of the compact design, you can also set Santa Claus down on desks, tables or nightstands to use it as a small night light. To turn on the light simply press the ON/OFF button on the base — powered by two replaceable CR2032 batteries (included). With the Lights by Night Clip Light, you can take the friendly form of Santa Claus anywhere!
